sentences.sContent: The ostensible purpose of these meetings was to gather information on financial strategies.
sentences.sCn: 这些会议声称旨在收集金融策略方面的信息。

remMethod.val: os(向上) + tens(拉) + ible → 向上拉长的 → 表面上的

trans.tranCn: 可公开得, (指理由等)表面的, 虚假的
trans.tranOther: Ostensible is used to describe something that seems to be true or is officially stated to be true, but about which you or other people have doubts
